name: Caithness Energy
overview: Caithness Energy, L.L.C, an independent power producer, engages in the development, acquisition, operation, and management of renewable geothermal, wind, and solar energy power projects in the United States. It also owns and operates natural gas power plants. The company, through its subsidiaries, provides asset management, operations and maintenance, and development support services. Its asset management services include contract administration and optimization, contract development and negotiation, energy management oversight, operations and management oversight, owner and partner relations, GAAP accounting and tax support, treasury, purchasing and accounts payable, budget development and management, financial reporting and variance analysis, asset sale and financing support, and regulatory support. The companyâ€™s operations and maintenance services include general operations and maintenance and compliance, outage support, engineering support, capital planning, and human resources and personnel management and development; and development support services include project scope, pro-forma development, permitting, vendor selection and management, contract development and negotiation, cash management and forecasting, and financial reporting and variance analysis. Caithness Energy, L.L.C was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in New York, New York. The company has project locations in Arlington, Oregon; Stockton, Bakersfield, and Blythe, California; Roswell, New Mexico; Rumford, Maine; Albany County and Brookhaven, New York; Tiverton, Rhode Island; Auburndale, Orlando, Umatilla, and Dade City, Florida; and Kathleen, Georgia. Caithness Energy, L.L.C is a subsidiary of Caithness Equities Corporation.
